fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Send your target a fake message, similar to hypnotist. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you are visited for the first time by a townie, they become your target, and you learn their name and role.
- Your investigative results always turn up favorably when investigated by this player, and you can't be killed by them.
- If multiple townies visit you, one of them will be selected randomly to be the target.
- Your target appears to be a Revenant, and investigative results against them will always turn up unfavorably. You can read their whispers.
- All attacks towards your target are redirected towards you.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see your target die.
